title: Jonathan Pageau/Adam Friended Interview - Pirsig Can Help Adam Understand Jonathan Part 1
description: Adam is an open minded guy, but the SOM metaphysics of Evolutionary Theory is keeping him trapped when trying to understand the Value metaphysics of Pageau. Pirsig to the rescue! Also my usual comparison of Pirsig concepts with those of another philosophical framework - in this case, a proper paralell - the Cosmic pattern framework of Jonathan Pageau, one of my favorites.
